titleStmt.title: The humorous lieutenant, or, Generous enemies a comedy as it is now acted by His Majesties servants, at the Theatre-Royal in Drury-Lane.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.N., and sold by William Chandler, and Ralph Smith,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed jointly to Francis Beaumont and John Fletcher.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
